roleset.name: (cause to) be inactive or idle

example.name: idle-v: transitive
example.text: Chrysler will idle a Toledo assembly plant temporarily due to slowing sales of its profitable Jeep Cherokee and Wagoneer sport utility vehicles .
example.arg: due to slowing sales of its profitable Jeep Cherokee and Wagoneer sport utility vehicles

example.name: idle-v: passive
example.text: General Motors Corp. , meanwhile , said [0] it will idle for yet another week its Linden , N.J. , assembly plant , [*]bringing to three weeks the total time [0] [that plant] will be idled [*] during October [*T*-2] .

roleset.note: IDLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'idle' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from idle.01-v predicate notes)
